metadata.description: This title is a compilation of important documents on the declaration of Martial Law, statement of President Ferdinand E. Marcos, and the content of Proclamation No. 1081. Also, it contains general orders, letters of instructions, and presidential decrees related/relevant to the declaration of Martial Law in the Philippines.
metadata.subject: Martial Law
metadata.title: Vital Documents On The Declaration Of Martial Law In The Philippines
metadata.subject: Ferdinand Marcos
